testcase.name: should display an error message "Please check the quantity" when quantity is 0
Should display a error message if quantity is not available
should clear all the fields if CLEAR button is clicked
should display available sizes for the particular brand
buy now button should be disabled if totalprice is equal to " "
should navigate to "UserDetails" only when the totalprice is dispalyed
should navigate to "Home Page" from "UserDetails" if Back button is clicked

testsuite.name: Shopping Cart App Must Be Able To Calculate Price

testcase.classname: Shopping Cart App Must Be Able To Calculate Price
testcase.name: should calculate total price when quantity is 1
should navigate to UserBillingDetails if user clicks on Yes
should navigate to Checkout page if user clicks on No
